name: NOC | IPAM | VRF Group Address Collision

en.subject_template: VRF Group Address Collision detected for {{vrf}}:{{address}}
en.body_template: NOC detects address collision for VRF group. {{vrf}}:{{address}} is already presents in IPAM in VRF {{existing_vrf}}{% if existing_object %} ({{existing_object}}){% endif %}
en.probable_causes: Equipment misconfiguration of IP address misallocation
en.recommended_actions: Check address allocation and equipment configuration

disposition.name: dispose
disposition.alarm_class__name: NOC | IPAM | VRF Group Address Collision
